project_descr: The focus of the project is on promoting energy efficiency (EE) by improving energy management and reducing energy consumption in the residential sector in Turkmenistan. This will lead to a reduction of greenhouse gas emissions.

outputs.output_descr: The focus of the project is on promoting energy efficiency (EE) by improving energy management and reducing energy consumption in the residential sector in Turkmenistan. This will lead to a reduction of greenhouse gas emissions.
